name: Gym Class: Basketball VR
summary:
Gym Class is the top VR basketball simulator. Experience high-flying dunks, pickup games with friends around the world, and compete to be a star in the largest VR sports community.

With state-of-the-art physics, Gym Class makes VR basketball feel like the real thing. Use your real-life shooting, passing, and dribbling moves in the game - unlocking more creativity, and a better workout along the way.
